item.description:
Bert Cox, Short Sales

Short Sales are on the rise . . . it’s time to venture into short sales!


Bert Cox, Founder of NHREIA, has been doing short sales and selling houses fast since 2002 and investing in real estate since 1984. He has completed hundred and hundreds of short sale (inclulding 71 short sales in 2009 alone.) His success rate is 90%+.
Bert will cover the steps and process for those thinking of venturing into short sales.

You’ll learn:

· How to work with distressed homeowners facing pre-foreclosure

· How to negotiate with the bank

· How to complete a short sale package

· How to capitalize on short sales in a down market

· New government regulations

· Latest findings for meeting compliance on simultaneous closings

6:30 PM, Wednesday, June 9, 2010

Best Western Executive Court

13500 South Willow Street, Manchester

Free for members; $20 for non-members

www.nhreia.com
item.name: The New Hampshire Real Estate Investors Association Monthly Meetup
